title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your persuasive powers are likely phenomenal as you tune into peoples motivations and desires with little effort. You can also assist allies with whom you share mutual interests while the abundant Taurus Moon in your 7th House of Others receives a cooperative boost from compelling Pluto. Be mindful of running roughshod over someones feelings in your zeal to make things happen. But as long as youre seeking an outcome that is beneficial to all, everybody can be happy about your involvement. The difference between persuasion and manipulation is intent. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
